name: omnibox-browser-extension
description: A browser extension that adds a command palette to the browser

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch & web-ext run --source-dir=dist
scripts.start:chrome: npm run build && npm run watch & web-ext run --source-dir=dist --target chromium
scripts.version: node scripts/updateManifest.js $npm_package_version && prettier --write manifest.json && git add manifest.json

author: Lasse Kuechler <lasse@ukuechler.de>
